title: What is meant by ripple?
message:
Just read the thread: [h=1][solved] 820-2936 randomly turning off after liquid[/h] Ripple is mentioned in it quite a few times so is it something you will see when measuring voltage with a multimeter or something you would see on an oscilloscope?
Thanks

title: What is meant by ripple?
message: Nice, thanks for that, got it.

title: What is meant by ripple?
message: When a circuit with 16v input that is designed to make 3.42v output gets water on it, some 16v may make its way into the output for a quick moment, and it fucks up everything.
